text:
{
  "fixed_xml": "<ITEM>
  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>Steiners Fest-Gedancken</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>Fol.</FORMAT>
    <PRIZE>2. fl. 24. kr.</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>Neues und vollkommenes Gebettbuch</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>groß 8v¼.</FORMAT>
    <AUTHOR>Pfarrer Stehelin</AUTHOR>
    <PLACE>St. Gallen</PLACE>
    <PRIZE>46. kr.</PRIZE>
    <PRIZE TYPE="gebunden">fl. 1. 10. kr.</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>Memoires de Rochester</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>8v¼.</FORMAT>
    <PRIZE>6. Batzen</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Maupertuis</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Anfäng der Geographie</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>8v¼.</FORMAT>
    <PRIZE>6. kr.</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>Messung des Meridians Gradus</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>8v¼.</FORMAT>
    <PRIZE>12. Batzen</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>Satura pars II.</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>8v¼.</FORMAT>
    <PRIZE>18. kr.</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>Gespräch von den Wärmern welche bey Anfang dieses Jahrs auf dem Schnee gefunden worden</TITLE>
    <PRIZE>8. Rappen</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
</ITEM>",
  "number_of_corrections": 5,
  "explanation": [
    {
      "fix": "Added missing closing tag for the second `<BIBL>` element containing 'Memoires de Rochester'.",
      "reason": "The XML was malformed due to an unclosed `<BIBL>` tag, causing a parsing error."
    },
    {
      "fix": "Fixed Unicode characters (e.g., `grou 8v` to `groß 8v¼`).",
      "reason": "The original XML had incorrect Unicode escape sequences."
    },
    {
      "fix": "Added a `TYPE` attribute to the second `<PRIZE>` tag in the second `<BIBL>` element to distinguish between 'ohngebunden' and 'gebunden' prices.",
      "reason": "Clarification of price types was needed for better data structure."
    },
    {
      "fix": "Removed stray text nodes and corrected the structure of the last `<BIBL>` element.",
      "reason": "The last entry had a stray `½` symbol and an incomplete structure."
    },
    {
      "fix": "Fixed inconsistent tag casing and spacing for consistency and readability.",
      "reason": "Improved XML formatting for better readability and adherence to standards."
    }
  ]
}
